titleStmt.title: Joyfull news from Ireland, being a relation of a battell which was fought between the Protestants, and the rebels of Ireland, where the Protestants got the victory, giving the rebels a great overthrow. Also how the Earle of Mackquere was taken prisoner. Also the copy of a proclamation set forth by the rebels. With the warrantable and true discovery of the last plot in Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
